import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get category-entity type links"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/categories/{CategoryTypeId}/link/{EntityTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the associations between a category type and an entity type. Use this to understand which categories are linked to specific entity types in the system, such as mapping asset categories to asset type entities.

**Prerequisites**
1. **CategoryTypeId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2) and extract `Items[].CategoryTypeId`.
2. **EntityTypeId** - Obtain from system entity type configuration or related endpoints.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the CategoryTypeId for your target category taxonomy.
2. Identify the EntityTypeId for the entity you want to link.
3. [GET /api/v1.0/categories/\{CategoryTypeId\}/link/\{EntityTypeId\}](/docs/api/categories/get-category-entity-type-links) to retrieve existing associations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: CategoryTypeId (path), EntityTypeId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"CategoryTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Category type identifier"},{"name":"EntityTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Entity type identifier"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
